name: @notcc/logic
description: NotCC, standing for Nice Optimal Terrific Cool Challenge, is a tile based game(WIP)

scripts.build-proto: pbjs -t static-module --force-number -w es6 src/parsers/nccs.proto -o src/parsers/nccs.pb.js && pnpm build-proto-types
scripts.build-proto-types: pbjs -t static-module --force-number -w es6 src/parsers/nccs.proto -o tmp_nccs.js && pbts -o src/parsers/nccs.pb.d.ts tmp_nccs.js && pnpm make-proto-hacks;rm tmp_nccs.js
scripts.make-proto-hacks: sed -i '/import Long = require("long");/d' ./src/parsers/nccs.pb.d.ts && sed -i 's:import\ \*\ as\ \$protobuf\ from\ \"protobufjs/minimal\"\;:import\ \$protobuf\ from\ \"protobufjs/minimal.js\"\;:' ./src/parsers/nccs.pb.js
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && pnpm build-proto && pnpm build-src && pnpm copy-proto-files

author: G lander
